display.title: Indium
description: Getting &&aIndium&&r requires a lot of &&dSulfuric Acid&&r, and two different ores: Galena and Sphalerite.
&&dSulfuric Acid&&r can be produced in large scale in the &&3Large Chemical Reactor&&r, or obtained as a waste from the &&9Platinum Group Sludge&&r process.
In &&dLuV&&r, the mandatory &&9Naquadah chain&&r will grant &&aIndium&&r too, which means this setup will have a limited life.
&&l&&3Lore:&&r&&o This is another small chain inherited from GregTech 5. However, this used to yield one tiny Dust instead, which was... interesting.
